name: itinerary-travel-journal-app
description: My Itinerary Travel Journal. This App will let you make a date to date itinerary of your travels. You will be able to input flights, hotel check-in/check-out dates, and a record of all the places, and what time, you want to visit for that day. You will be also be able to e-mail your itinerary to people as either a safety measure or as a way to meet up with friends.
